GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14.259 to before v4.14.302
GSD.description:
xen/netback: don't call kfree_skb() with interrupts disabled

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.302 by commit 2b81c566ab5724976de59ad7787e204f7938ae27, it was introduced in version v4.14.259 by commit 9bebb2eedf679b3be4acaa20efda97f32c999d74. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: xen/netback: don't call kfree_skb() with interrupts disabled
